summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1543, for the improvement of Republican Street, from Fairview Avenue to Minor Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 16701 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
